entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 46. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
